page.title: 17NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: There are many different{events}go on in one year in our area.There are town sports,all the Junior and Primary schools in Stockton district take part and our own school sports in summer. In the estate of Roseworth the local community holds a{Festival}for one week each year including an exhibition social and dance,football,singing and cricket competitions. Our school collects money for Mr. Foster who runs a home for destitute children in India and we look forward to his annual visit. The police, fire service, and public bus service have visited school this year in an effort to foster better relationships. We all enjoyed these visits and learned a great deal. During the summer holidays the local Authority runs{Play Schemes}where we can do many things and have trips and organised rambles.
